## Subdomain Request

**Requested Subdomain:** `{your-name}.{domain}.com`

### Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please ensure:

- [ ] I have read the [Domain Registration Guide](../domains/README.md)
- [ ] My JSON file is named `domains/{my-username}.json`
- [ ] All required fields are filled in correctly
- [ ] My subdomain starts with my chosen letter (A-Z)
- [ ] I have checked the [letter availability chart](../waitlist/) to ensure my letter is available
- [ ] My email address is valid
- [ ] My target URL/IP is accessible
- [ ] I am not requesting a duplicate subdomain
- [ ] My JSON follows the correct format (see examples in `/domains/README.md`)

### JSON File Content

```json
{
  "owner": "your-username",
  "email": "your-email@example.com",
  "subdomain": "your-username",
  "domain": "soulfra|calriven|deathtodata|cringeproof",
  "letter": "A-Z",
  "target": "your-site.github.io",
  "record_type": "CNAME"
}
```

### What happens next?

1. **Automated Validation**: GitHub Actions will automatically validate your request
2. **Auto-Merge**: If validation passes, your PR will be auto-merged
3. **DNS Propagation**: Your subdomain will be live within 5-10 minutes
4. **Certificate**: SSL certificate will be auto-generated by Cloudflare

### Need Help?

- Check the [Domain Registration Guide](../domains/README.md) for detailed instructions
- View [example domain files](../domains/) for reference
- Open an issue if you encounter problems

---

**By submitting this PR, I confirm that:**
- I will use this subdomain responsibly
- I will not use it for phishing, malware, spam, or illegal content
- I understand that violating the abuse policy will result in immediate revocation
